object.summary:
Customer reported that while running a java app, it fails with error: 'GThread-ERROR **: GThread system may only be initialized once. aborting...'
It looks like glib2 doesn't allow calling multiple times g_thread_init().

object.reproducer:
It can be reproduced with the file ProbeContentTypeCrashes.java supplied by the customer:
1) /usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.7.0-ibm-1.7.0/bin/javac ProbeContentTypeCrashes.java 2) /usr/lib64/jvm/jre-1.7.0-ibm/bin/java -classpath /tmp ProbeContentTypeCrashes 2
object.summary: With multiple threads, a Java program calling the glib2 library crashes.
